title: Roles Lookup
description: Explore the roles of a user globally or the roles assigned in a Twitch channel.

title: Vanity Tester
description: Try colors, paints and badges on your Twitch user.

title: Emote Stats
description: View shareable emote usage from Twitch and its third-party emote providers.

title: Best Logs
description: API and website that provides the best logs of a user for a Twitch channel.
